title: Season 6 Experience
body:
Cheers Riot. Since starting season 6, we have literally had two occasions where the queue time has been 0 seconds. Not sure how this is possible, but I'm not going to complain about it. Haha. No trolls or toxicity in the 15 games I've played so far, which is great. 
However, the new season is highly in the favour of pre-made games, especially 5 man. Solo queue has become substantially harder due to the communication advantage, so guys add me :) (silver 2 last season). 
Also, I cannot access my ranked stats for some reason. Not the end of the world, but would top of a nice start to season 6.
